snippet: A New York Post columnist raises the issue of exotic and unusual restaurant wine offerings, with many readers debating his stand.
abstract: Eric Asimov The Pour column says The New York Post restaurant critic Steve Cuozzo's recent columnn raises the issue of exotic and unusual restaurant wine offerings, as he ranted about restaurants with wine lists that are inscrutable; bloggers and readers from coast to coast debated his stand, many denouncing him for know-nothingism and ignorance.
